Name: Oh Cecilie!
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A tasty Danish riff on the Negroni.
History: Created in 2010 by Carl Wrangel at the Oak Room, Copenhagen, Denmark and named after his girlfriend.
Nutrition: One serving of Oh Cecilie! contains 211 calories
